PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_SolidStratumCapacity
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties expressing the capacity of a stratum using physical measures. Regional and National conventions should be captured through classification and specific property sets.

PropertyDef.Name: CohesionBehaviour
PropertyDef.Definition: Cohesive shear strength of a rock or soil that is independent of interparticle friction.

PropertyDef.Name: FrictionAngle
PropertyDef.Definition: Friction angle is the tested inclination angle from horizontal.

PropertyDef.Name: FrictionBehaviour
PropertyDef.Definition: Friction shear strength of a rock or soil that is dependent on interparticle friction.

PropertyDef.Name: HydraulicConductivity
PropertyDef.Definition: Hydraulic Conductivity (permeability) of soil for water, given with the K or Kf value in m/s

PropertyDef.Name: LoadBearingCapacity
PropertyDef.Definition: Maximum load bearing capacity of the floor structure throughtout the storey as designed.

PropertyDef.Name: NValue
PropertyDef.Definition: Blow count from standard penetration testing, to ISO 22476-3, ASTM D1586[1] and Australian Standards AS 1289.6.3.1, which correlates to other engineering properties of soils.

PropertyDef.Name: PermeabilityBehaviour
PropertyDef.Definition: Proportionality constant in Darcy's law which relates flow rate and viscosity to a pressure gradient applied to the porous media.

PropertyDef.Name: PoisonsRatio
PropertyDef.Definition: Ratio of transverse contraction strain to longitudinal extension strain in the direction of stretching force.

PropertyDef.Name: PwaveVelocity
PropertyDef.Definition: P-wave velocity of a rock or soil.

PropertyDef.Name: Resistivity
PropertyDef.Definition: Electrical resistivity of a rock or soil (Ohm-m).

PropertyDef.Name: SettlementBehaviour
PropertyDef.Definition: Estimate of the settlement/compaction behaviour of the stratum.

PropertyDef.Name: SwaveVelocity
PropertyDef.Definition: S-wave velocity of a rock or soil.
